graph_title: Proportion of women aged 20–24 years who were married or in a union before age 15 and before age 18
indicator_name: Proportion of women aged 20–24 years who were married or in a union before age 15 and before age 18
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Eliminate all harmful practices, such as child, early and forced marriage and female genital mutilation
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Proportion of women aged 20–24 years who were married or in a union before age 15 and before age 18
methodology_global: UNICEF: This indicator provides the proportion of women aged 20 to 24 years who were first married or in union by age 18. It is calculated by dividing the number of women aged 20-24 who were first married or in union by age 18 by the total number of women aged 20-24 in the population
SDG_GOAL: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
SDG_TARGET: Eliminate all harmful practices, such as child, early and forced marriage and female genital mutilation
SDG_INDICATOR: Proportion of women aged 20–24 years who were married or in a union before age 15 and before age 18
